description:
With a bigger battery and integrated USB-C charging, the PD35R takes one of Fenix’s most popular lights to the next level. Dual tail-cap switches give you access to momentary activation of both the steady beam and the strobe, as well as easily cycling through the modes. Compatibility with a single rechargeable 18650 (included) or 2 CR123A batteries gives you options on the grid, or off.

  • 6 lighting modes: 10 lumens (100h), 50 lumens (38h), 350 lumens (4.75h), 1000 lumens (2.9h), 1700 lumen turbo (2.25h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup) and 1700 lumen strobe
  • Onboard charging port means you no longer need to remove the battery to charge your light (you can still remove the battery)
  • Works with 1 rechargeable 18650 battery or 2 CR123A batteries, giving you convenient power options when travelling or stocking your emergency kit
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating
  • Momentary activation available from the larger tail-cap switch
  • Smaller tail-cap mode button gives you direct access to strobe from off, and cycles through the modes while on
  • LED power indicator under the side charging port lets you know when it's time to replace or charge your battery
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • In the box: PD35R, ARB-L18 3400mAh 18650 battery, holster, lanyard, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix PD35R Rechargeable Flashlight
